MS MCQs

    Pitch your product prototype - Tailor the message for your audience

    »

    1. What should you know about an investor you’re pitching to?

      What company they come from.

      Their background, job history, their previous investment history, and their investment thesis.

      How they take their coffee.


    2. What should you know about a customer you are pitching to?

      Where their stores are located.

      What products they sell.

      Their products, markets, current competitors, and their business model.
